info.name: Relaticle API
info.description: REST API for managing CRM entities including companies, people, opportunities, tasks, and notes.

item.name: Companies
item.description: Manage companies in your CRM workspace.

query.description: Filter results by name.
Sort results. Prefix with `-` for descending. Allowed: name, -name, created_at, -created_at, updated_at, -updated_at.
Include related resources (comma-separated). Allowed: creator, people, opportunities.
Number of results per page (1-100). Default: 15.
Cursor for cursor-based pagination. When present, switches from offset to cursor pagination.
Page number for offset pagination (when cursor is not used). Default: 1.

item.name: People
item.description: Manage people (contacts) in your CRM workspace.

query.description: Filter results by name.
Filter results by company_id.
Sort results. Prefix with `-` for descending. Allowed: name, -name, created_at, -created_at, updated_at, -updated_at.
Include related resources (comma-separated). Allowed: creator, company.
Number of results per page (1-100). Default: 15.
Cursor for cursor-based pagination. When present, switches from offset to cursor pagination.
Page number for offset pagination (when cursor is not used). Default: 1.

item.name: Opportunities
item.description: Manage sales opportunities in your CRM workspace.

query.description: Filter results by name.
Filter results by company_id.
Sort results. Prefix with `-` for descending. Allowed: name, -name, created_at, -created_at, updated_at, -updated_at.
Include related resources (comma-separated). Allowed: creator, company, contact.
Number of results per page (1-100). Default: 15.
Cursor for cursor-based pagination. When present, switches from offset to cursor pagination.
Page number for offset pagination (when cursor is not used). Default: 1.

response.body: {"data":{"id":"01khyzzkaz8g8nzw295eypk3fz","type":"opportunities","attributes":{"name":"Eum harum dolore nam et pariatur et laborum sunt.","creation_source":"web","created_at":"2026-02-21T02:20:42.000000Z","updated_at":"2026-02-21T02:20:42.000000Z","custom_fields":[]}}}

item.name: Tasks
item.description: Manage tasks in your CRM workspace.

query.description: Filter results by title.
Filter results by assigned_to_me.
Sort results. Prefix with `-` for descending. Allowed: title, -title, created_at, -created_at, updated_at, -updated_at.
Include related resources (comma-separated). Allowed: creator, assignees, companies, people, opportunities.
Number of results per page (1-100). Default: 15.
Cursor for cursor-based pagination. When present, switches from offset to cursor pagination.
Page number for offset pagination (when cursor is not used). Default: 1.

item.name: Notes
item.description: Manage notes in your CRM workspace.

query.description: Filter results by title.
Sort results. Prefix with `-` for descending. Allowed: title, -title, created_at, -created_at, updated_at, -updated_at.
Include related resources (comma-separated). Allowed: creator, companies, people, opportunities.
Number of results per page (1-100). Default: 15.
Cursor for cursor-based pagination. When present, switches from offset to cursor pagination.
Page number for offset pagination (when cursor is not used). Default: 1.
